original_text: There is nothing better for a man, than that he should eat and drink, and that he should make his soul enjoy good in his labour. This also I saw, that it was from the hand of God.
korean_text: 사람이 먹고 마시며 수고하는 것보다 그의 마음을 더 기쁘게 하는 것은 없나니 내가 이것도 본즉 하나님의 손에서 나오는 것이로다

sentences.original_text: There is nothing better for a man
sentences.korean_translation: 사람에게는 이보다 더 좋은 것이 없다

sentences.original_text: than that he should eat and drink
and that he should make his soul enjoy good
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 자기 영혼으로 하여금 좋은 것을 즐기게 하는 것보다

sentences.original_text: that it was from the hand of God
